# bufferIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the buffer to use for this layout.

## Declaration

```swift
var bufferIndex: Int
```

## Discussion

Most usage scenarios only use one buffer. Use a buffer index that is less than [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelMesh/Descriptor-swift.struct/vertexBufferCount].

## Describing a low-level mesh layout

- **bufferOffset**: The byte offset into the buffer for the first byte of this layout.
- **bufferStride**: The distance, in bytes, between consecutive vertices for attributes using this layout.
